entity.name: pa_patient_info
entity.deltaImportQuery: Select CONCAT('pa_patient_info_',id) as id,`hosp_district_name`,`hosp_district_name` From pa_patient_info where id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: Select id Form pa_patient_info where create_time > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: pa_physical_examination
entity.query: Select CONCAT('pa_physical_examination_',id) as id,`hosp_district_code`,`mi_code` From pa_physical_examination
entity.deltaImportQuery: Select CONCAT('pa_physical_examination_',id) as id,`hosp_district_code`,`mi_code` From pa_physical_examination where id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: Select id Form pa_physical_examination where create_time > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
